original_text:
But you, O Bethlehem Ephrathah,
    who are too little to be among the clans of Judah,
from you shall come forth for me
    one who is to be ruler in Israel,
whose coming forth is from of old,
    from ancient days.
korean_text: 베들레헴 에브라다야 너는 유다 족속 중에 작을지라도 이스라엘을 다스릴 자가 네게서 내게로 나올 것이라 그의 근본은 상고에, 영원에 있느니라

sentences.original_text: who are too little to be among the clans of Judah,
sentences.korean_translation: 유다 지파 중에서 너무 작은 너는,

sentences.original_text: from you shall come forth for me
sentences.korean_translation: 너에게서 나를 위해 한 사람이 나올 것이니

sentences.original_text: one who is to be ruler in Israel,
whose coming forth is from of old,
